objects.specification: The floor is represented by a smooth, seamless plane with a light gray finish. It resembles polished concrete with a subtle matte sheen, providing a stable and easy-to-clean surface for classroom activities.

The walls are vertical interior surfaces painted in a soft pastel shade, evoking a bright and welcoming atmosphere. Each wall has a smooth matte finish and forms clean right angles at the room’s corners.

The walls are vertical interior surfaces painted in a soft pastel shade, evoking a bright and welcoming atmosphere. Each wall has a smooth matte finish and forms clean right angles at the room’s corners.

The walls are vertical interior surfaces painted in a soft pastel shade, evoking a bright and welcoming atmosphere. Each wall has a smooth matte finish and forms clean right angles at the room’s corners.

The walls are vertical interior surfaces painted in a soft pastel shade, evoking a bright and welcoming atmosphere. Each wall has a smooth matte finish and forms clean right angles at the room’s corners.

The door is a solid wood panel with a warm brown finish, featuring a simple recessed panel design. The surface is smooth and matte, and the door integrates seamlessly with the wall color while adding a contrasting accent.

The window frame is slim and painted in a neutral light tone, containing clear glass panes with a subtle blue tint. The design allows abundant natural light and includes fine frame details to suggest mullions.

The window frame is slim and painted in a neutral light tone, containing clear glass panes with a subtle blue tint. The design allows abundant natural light and includes fine frame details to suggest mullions.

The curtain is made from a warm gold-colored fabric with gentle vertical folds, hanging from a concealed rod. The material has a soft texture and a slight sheen, adding a decorative and functional layer to the window opening.

The curtain is made from a warm gold-colored fabric with gentle vertical folds, hanging from a concealed rod. The material has a soft texture and a slight sheen, adding a decorative and functional layer to the window opening.

The teacher’s desk is a large rectangular table crafted from polished dark wood with a rich grain pattern. It features a thick tabletop supported by sturdy side panels and includes a modesty panel beneath, offering ample workspace and storage.

The board is a large rectangular writing surface with a deep black matte finish suitable for chalk or marker. It is framed with a slim profile matching its dark color and mounted flush against the wall for a clean appearance.

The ceiling-mounted projector is a compact rectangular device in a neutral gray finish. It features a slightly protruding lens at the front, small ventilation grilles on its sides, and a minimalistic housing design.

The teacher’s chair is an adjustable swivel seat with a padded backrest and cushion upholstered in a dark neutral fabric. It sits on a five-star metal base with smooth-rolling casters and includes a gas-lift mechanism for height adjustment.

The bookshelf is a tall, open-shelved unit made from dark wood with a smooth matte finish. Each shelf is evenly spaced and stocked with stylized book spines, lending a realistic, organized appearance.

The bookshelf is a tall, open-shelved unit made from dark wood with a smooth matte finish. Each shelf is evenly spaced and stocked with stylized book spines, lending a realistic, organized appearance.

The bookshelf is a tall, open-shelved unit made from dark wood with a smooth matte finish. Each shelf is evenly spaced and stocked with stylized book spines, lending a realistic, organized appearance.

The bookshelf is a tall, open-shelved unit made from dark wood with a smooth matte finish. Each shelf is evenly spaced and stocked with stylized book spines, lending a realistic, organized appearance.

The educational poster is a flat sheet of matte paper featuring colorful charts and diagrams. It is unframed, directly affixed to the wall, and presents clear text and graphical details for instructional use.
The wall clock is a round timepiece with a slender orange bezel. It has a white face, bold black numerals, and slender black hands, conveying a clear and modern look.
The potted plant features a cluster of lush green leaves radiating from a central stem. It sits in a simple neutral-toned pot with a smooth matte texture, adding a natural accent to the room.
The potted plant features a cluster of lush green leaves radiating from a central stem. It sits in a simple neutral-toned pot with a smooth matte texture, adding a natural accent to the room.
The waste bin is a small open-top cylinder with a neutral gray matte finish. It has straight sides and a uniform color, designed for unobtrusive placement near furniture.

The ceiling light fixture is a shallow cylindrical form with a creamy white housing. It has a frosted diffuser plate that disperses bright, even illumination across the room.
